data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
"DVB" should be obvious, because it's a module aboutg this API and
    has extra functionality related to DVB streams (which probably
    should go into a different, non-OS-sepcific module..)

    "Linux" was chosen to emhpasize that this is a linux-specific
    module that will not work on other opertaing systems.
